mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_detail ( PRODUCT_DETAIL_ID, PRODUCT_ID, COLOR, SIZE, STOCK_QUANTITY, STOCK_IN_DATE, EXPECTED_STOCK_IN_DATE, NOTE, STATUS ) VALUES ( #{productDetailId}, #{productId} ,#{color}, #{size}, #{stockQuantity}, now(), now(), #{note}, 1 )
